Judul: DESAIN INTERAKSI SYNCHRONOUS ONLINE LEARNING MENGGUNAKAN VIDEOCONFERENCING
Abstrak:
The COVID-19 pandemic accelerates the digitalization of various field and education is one of
them. For that reason, it is necessary for teacher and student to adapt their learning method into
e-learning. However, the tools to accommodate specially e-learning is lacking. To resolve this
problem, there is a need to create a new interaction design to accommodate e-learning with
better efficiency. Therefore, this paper focuses on helping both students and teachers to carry
out e-learning efficiently. The interaction design implemented according to goal-directed
design (GDD) methodology. GDD has 5 steps, which is, research, modeling, requirement,
framework, and refinement. Based on observation and literature study, there is 13 features that
divided into 4 functionalities, the features are, Videoconferencing, Audioconferencing, Instant
messaging, Remote control, Shared desktop and application, File sharing, Shared whiteboard,
Annotations, Question and pools, Instant Feedback, Presence control, Log, and Division into
group. The usability goal is efficient to use, and the user experience goal is helpful. Both goals
are based on the focus of helping students and teachers to carry out e-learning efficiently. There
are four metrics that used to measure achievability of usability and user experience goals. To
measure usability goal, system usability scale (SUS) and overall relative efficiency are used.
To measure user experience goal, value/usefulness subscale from intrinsic motivation
inventory (IMI) is used. Lastly Simple Ease Question (SEQ) is used to measure the
achievability of the interaction design. The results from testing show a value of 89,5 for the
SUS metric, 80,37% for the overall relative efficiency, 6,8 for the IMI metric, and 6,9 for SEQ
metric. Based on these number, can be conclude that usability and user experience have been
achieved.
Kata Kunci: e-learning, videoconferencing, goal-directed design, usability testing
